sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './histories.css' const TransferHistory = (props) => { console.log(props) //states const [history, setHistory] = useState([]) //Functions const getHistory = () => { const history1 = [] db.collection('Deposits').where('user', '==', user.email).get().then(qSnap => { qSnap.forEach(doc => { const data = doc.data() history1.push(data) }) setHistory(history1) }) } useEffect(()=> { getHistory() }, [user]) return(
{history.length > 0 && history.map(h => { let dateStr let newDate if(typeof h.date !== 'string'){ dateStr = String(h.date) newDate = `${dateStr.substring(4,6)}/${dateStr.substring(6,8)}/${dateStr.substring(0,4)}` } return( <>
{h.type === 'withdrawl' ? 'Withdrawl' : 'Deposit'} {h.type === 'withdrawl' ? '-' : '+'}${h.amount}
{typeof h.date === 'string' ? h.date : newDate}
{h.type === 'withdrawl' ? 'Withdrawl' : 'Deposit'}
{typeof h.date === 'string' ? h.date : newDate}
{h.type === 'withdrawl' ? '-' : '+'}${h.amount}
) })}
Deposit
10/11/2020
+$10
Withdraw
11/11/2020
-$10
Deposit
12/11/2020
+$10
) } export default TransferHistory
